Text:
I don't know if anyone else noticed, but I my audio gets out of sync when I enter the second third of the movie. I'm sure it's not me, I play HD movies all the time, and I'm using VLC.

I just wanted to say it to the uploader, because he's awesome, and I always download from him when I can :)

@Junky009
yep, i noticed it too.
the audio at some point "sometimes" out of sync.
look like audio comes out late for 5ms
and i using the latest K-Lite Mega Codec Pack
